The claim is directly quoted from Presid: s tweet on February 12, stating that "72% of refugees admitted into U.S. (2/3 -2/11) during COURT BREAKDOWN are from 7 countries: SYRIA, IRAQ, SOMALIA, IRAN, SUDAN, LIBYA & YEMEN."
The expert: s analysis shows that from February 3 to February 11, the percentage of refugees arriving from the seven countries mentioned in the claim was approximately 72% or 1,049 out of 1,462.
The expert also notes that the number of: s immigration ban has steadily increased since February 3, while the arrivals from countries not affected by the ban have decreased.
